page.title: 16Children's Hobbies
page.content:
Most children like to collect things e.g.rubbers,stamps,earings,even mugs. We did a survey on how many children in our class have collections. The ten most popular are :- 1 Posters;2 Earings Stationery, Stickers;3 Stamps,Rubbers, Mugs, 4 Ornaments;5 Airfix models, Postcards 6 Dolls,Soaps; 7 Pencils & Pens ,Model Cars;8 Sharpeners;9 Beer Mats;10 Fans.
Most Children in our class prefer taking part in activities to collec- tions,the reason being it makes them feel part of something.We made a list of the ten most popular activities:- 1 Youth Club,Sports;2 Ice/Roller Skating;3 Swimming;4 Athletics; 5 Martial Arts;6 Scouts/Guides; 7 Aerobics;8Gymnastics;9 Playing Musical Instruments;10 Horse Riding.
